EmailTemplate.subject: Learn from Honeywell and IBM Experts on Connected Maintenance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> WEBINAR:
CONNECTED MAINTENANCE Join the free webinar on: Date June 27, 2018
Time 10-11 a.m. EDT
Speakers:
Helmuth Naumer Associate Partner IBM Travel and Transportation Center of Competency
Roman Lopatko Sr. Director, Connected Aircraft Honeywell Aerospace
Connected Maintenance - Reduce Costs and Improve Turnaround Times
You may have heard the terms connected maintenance or predictive maintenance, but do you really know how it works and what it can do for you? Two industry powerhouses join forces to bring you the latest trend in Connected Maintenance.
Learn how you can leverage the power of connectivity by linking the physical operation to the digital realm – without disruptive upgrades. Get the knowledge you need to optimize operations through Connected Maintenance from this webinar.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[http://pages.aviationweek.com/Connecte-Maintenance-Reduce-Costs-Improve-Turnaround-Time?partnerref=AWSTnews]]>
